amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to increase and decrease funding by $1,000,000 for the United States Postal Service (USPS) to support USPS expanding its non-bank financial services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Pascrell.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
